page.title: 07HOLIDAYS AND SOCIAL CLUBS
page.content: Most Edale people took holidays in England , Wales and Scotland , mostly at the sea-side.European countries visited were Spain,France,Germany, Ibiza,Austria,Minorca,Greece,Denmark and Ireland.Others visited the Seychelles ,Canada,Israel and India. VILLAGE CLUBS AND GROUPS. These are clubs and groups meeting in Edale.Tennis Club,Cricket Club,Play Group,Village Hall Committee,Youth Club,Horticultural Society,Over 60s Club, Women's Institute,Ringing Roger Club,Football Club,Champion House Committee,Swimming Club,Darts and Dominoes Club,Poetry Reading Group, Church Choir,School Governors, Friends of Edale School, Parish Council, Parochial Church Council, Flower Club.
